Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the interior is slightly ribbed, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:30-31 House T25 Wall 52
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393607) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393607)
